AboutMeDesc1: I was born in Italy in 30/11/2003 and love the world of computer science and software development
AboutMeDesc2: My work experience in this field began in March 2023, and I immediately became passionate about programming languages
ExperienceLabel1: I started as an IT consultant
ExperienceLabel2: now I develop for BRT (one of the most important courier companies in italy)
ExperienceDesc1: My career began in March 2023, my first project was about a site where I could reserve an electric scooter sharing
ExperienceDesc2: After that with my college colleagues I started a new project to recycle food close to expiration, in this app you can buy discounted food from super markets to avoid waste!
ExperienceDesc3: In June 2023 I started working with BRT, which is one of the most important courier companies in italy, and here I learned a lot of new technology
ExperienceDesc4: For example Kubernetes, Single Spa, and many programming languages
